definition: heart/intention/one's inclination/state of mind/to have the heart for sth/mood

sentences.english: Psyllium offers benefits in patients with irritable bowel syndrome in primary care.
sentences.chinese: 欧车前在肠易激综合征患者的初级保健中疗效最佳。

sentences.english: In addition, MRP2 also influences the complicated absorption process of the traditional Chinese medicine, in particul…
sentences.chinese: 此外，MRP2还影响着中药成分的肠吸收过程。

sentences.english: Distribution and ratio of enterococcus species among different animals were different.
sentences.chinese: 不同动物消化道肠球菌种的分布不同，比例各异。

sentences.english: Glutamine combined with rush had some synergetic effect on supporting bowel barrier function.
sentences.chinese: 联合应用谷氨酰胺和生长激素可改善肠粘膜功能。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the diagnosis and treatment of intestinal atresia in newborns.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结新生儿肠闭锁的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of Cisapride on postoperative colonic peristalsis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察西沙比利对结肠术后肠运动功能的影响。

sentences.english: The results of drug-fast showed that tolerance of Streptococcus faecium was higher than that of Streptococcus faecalis.
sentences.chinese: 药敏结果显示屎肠球菌的耐药性高于粪肠球菌。

sentences.english: Especially scrambled, with bacon or sausage.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是加了培根或烤肠的炒鸡蛋。

sentences.english: None of the coats was contaminated with VRE.
sentences.chinese: 抗万古霉素肠球菌的大衣没有被污染。
萨拉米肠，番茄，黑橄榄，香蒜酱。

sentences.english: Working in the laboratory, the research team took samples of intestinal tissue from mice.
sentences.chinese: 该研究小组在实验室中对小鼠肠组织取样。

sentences.english: Objective: Study on characteristics and function for Entercoccus faecium viable bacteria preparations.
sentences.chinese: 对屎肠球菌活菌制剂的特性及功效进行研究和分析。

sentences.english: Specific examples include erythromycin and enterobactin biosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 特例包括红霉素和肠菌素的生物合成。

sentences.english: Chronic intussusception is defined as intussusception lasting for 14 days or more.
sentences.chinese: 慢性肠套疉是指肠套叠持续存在超过14天。

sentences.english: Results The proportion of Enterococci lied in the sixth position in all the isolated clinical pathogens.
sentences.chinese: 结果肠球菌属的数量占全部分离到细菌种类的第6位。

sentences.english: Mucosal cells may be the major source of intestinal PAF.
sentences.chinese: 肠粘膜固有细胞是PAF来源的重要细胞。
